title: Eva belly laughs at Lily
summary: She likes to look at Lily and belly laugh - especially when she runs around

title: Rollin' rollin' rollin' rollin'
summary: Eva thinks crawling is for suckers

title: Blink Language
summary: Eva thinks she can speak to us by blinking

title: Yellow elephant
summary: Eva loves her yellow elephant from Nana and tackles it when she sees it.

title: Swim Crawling
summary: Eva's form of 'crawling' looks more like freestyle swimming - on carpet.

title: First Word?
summary: Eva says 'hi!' paired with hand waiving. Not quite there with 'bye.'
